title: dao+
body:
Although the current dao dividend is a good idea, there are still two points criticized by everyone. The first is that the interest rates of the three usdt dividend pools are almost the same. The second is that as the publicity said, "The project party also needs to buy currency mortgages to get the project income. KLend has become the first lending platform on BSC that has no fees and pays dividends. "However, the actual project income did not continue to increase dynamically, but was accumulated in the risk reserve, resulting in the total amount of dividends in the dao pool not being updated.
I propose the solution as follows. 80% of the money that the project party gets daily through the spread is converted into usdt and deposited into the dao prize pool of total usdt. At the same time, based on 1% of the remaining u in the total pool every day, as the total reward amount of the 3 pools today, it is allocated to the 30, 60, and 180 lock-up period prize pools in a ratio of 1:1.5:2. In this way, the two problems are solved.
At the same time, for the users whose total locked positions in the 3 pools reach the top three, the rewards should be doubled to encourage the purchase of klt, so that there are both locked positions and purchases, which will be invincible!
目前的dao分红，虽然是个好创意，但是目前还是有两点被大家诟病。第一就是3个usdt分红池的利率几乎一样，第二就是如宣传说的“项目方自己也要买币抵押才能获得项目收益，KLend成为BSC上第一个没有手续费并且还分红的借贷平台。”，但实际项目收益未进行持续动态增加，而是积累在风险储备金中，导致dao池的分红总量未更新。
我提议解决方式如下，项目方通过利差每日得到的钱，80%转化为usdt存入总usdt的dao奖池。同时每天根据总池所剩下的u中的1%，作为今日3个池子的总奖励量，按照1:1.5:2的比例依次分配给30，60，180锁仓周期的奖池。这样两个问题就得到解决。
同时对于3个池总锁仓达到前三的用户，还应该翻倍奖励，用来鼓励购买klt，这样既有锁仓又有购买，将所向披靡！
